Key ties: Maria–Vassily (parent), Vassily–Zosima (child), Madame–Zosima (supporter), Grigory–Zosima (other), +2 more

story_summary: Father Zossima, feeling weak but joyful, confesses and delivers a heartfelt final message to the monks about love and humility. Alyosha receives a letter from Madame Hohlakov about a fulfilled prophecy concerning a sergeant’s widow’s son, which stirs excitement and skepticism among the monks. Later, Alyosha meets the austere Father Païssy, who gives him solemn advice and a blessing before Alyosha leaves the monastery to fulfill his promises.
evidence_quotes: “Love one another, Fathers,” said Father Zossima
Father Païssy blessed him. As Alyosha left the monastery
